MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:56am. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Hope Park Gardens substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
